page.title: 07Mid Warwickshire Crematorium
page.content: Mid Warwickshire Crematorium stands on 14 acres on the west side of Oakley wood. It is administered by Warwick council but also serves Stratford Rugby And Banbury as they have no facilities of their own. Only 40% of Cremations come from Warwick district. Approximately 1700 cremations take place per year. 6 people are employed; a manager, clerk, gardener, chapel attendant, assistant and crematorium attendant. Facilities consist of two chapels, 1 seating 85 and the other 20. Each chapel has a Waiting Room and Vestry. There is also a Chapel of Remembrance containing the Book of Remembrance as no other form of memorial is permitted. There are Committal and Cremator Rooms containing 3 gas fired cremators. There are also 2 offices, ancillary rooms and Manager's house.
